items.sentence: Maybe Tom was really as busy as he said he was.
Would somebody please tell me what\'s going on?
Tom works at a convenience store near my house.
Tom worries about the health of his loved ones.
Tom, who are you going to spend Christmas with?
Was it easy for you to find a job in Australia?
Was that the first time that you were arrested?
You should\'ve told me that you weren\'t happy.
Don\'t you think we should tell Tom about this?
Don\'t you wish you could go to Boston with us?
Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to do that.
Tom insulted Mary. That\'s why she\'s so upset.
How many times have you played tennis with Tom?
Tom saw something in the woods that scared him.
That\'s something that we\'ll never understand.
That\'s the ugliest dress that I\'ve ever seen.
Are you going to take the entrance examination?
Are you still planning on going back to Boston?
Are you sure this is what Tom wanted us to buy?
Students were throwing snowballs at each other.
